    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddTaskDto
    DTO representing a request to add tasks to a user.
    CountInfoView
    View DTO representing a count of items.
    CreateTaskDto
    DTO representing a request to create a new task.
    CreateUserDto
    DTO representing a request to create a new user.
    CustomGenericFilter<T>
    Generic repository interface for performing filtered and paginated queries.
    CustomGenericFilter<T>
    Abstract generic repository providing pagination and filtering capabilities.
    CustomTaskRepository
    Custom repository interface for advanced task queries and operations.
    CustomTaskRepositoryImpl
    Implementation of CustomTaskRepository using ReactiveMongoTemplate.
    EntityNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a requested entity is not found in the system.
    FilterCriteriaDto<T>
    Data Transfer Object representing a single filter criterion.
    FilterDto
    Data Transfer Object representing a set of filter criteria.
    GlobalExceptionHandler
    Global exception handler that centralizes error handling for all REST controllers.
    IdResponseDto
    Response DTO containing a single entity ID.
    Operation
    Enumeration of supported filter operations for dynamic queries.
    PageResponseDto<T>
    Generic response DTO representing a paginated list of items.
    ResponseDto<T>
    Generic response DTO used to wrap all API responses.
    ResponseWrapperAspect
    Aspect responsible for automatically wrapping REST controller responses into a ResponseDto object.
    Status
    Enumeration representing the possible statuses of a task.
    SwaggerExampleObjects
     
    Task
    Represents a task entity stored in the MongoDB collection "tasks".
    TaskController
    REST controller for managing tasks.
    TaskManagerApplication
     
    TaskRepository
    Repository interface for Task entities.
    TaskRepositoryImpl
    Repository implementation for tasks with pagination and filtering support.
    TaskResponseDto
    Response DTO representing a task.
    TaskService
    Service interface for managing tasks.
    TaskServiceImpl
    Service implementation for managing tasks.
    TaskWithPaginationAndFilterView
    View DTO representing a paginated and optionally filtered list of tasks.
    UpdateResponseDto
    Response DTO representing the result of an update operation.
    UpdateTaskDto
    DTO representing a request to update an existing task.
    User
    Represents a user entity stored in the MongoDB collection "users".
    UserController
    REST controller for managing users.
    UserRepository
    Repository interface for User entities.
    UserRepositoryImpl
    Repository implementation for users with pagination and filtering support.
    UserResponseDto
    Response DTO representing a user.
    UserService
    Service interface for managing users.
    UserServiceImpl
    Service implementation for managing users.
    UserWithPaginationAndFilterView
    View DTO representing a paginated list of users.
